{"id":"chatcmpl-246","object":"chat.completion","created":1767176304,"model":"gpt-oss:120b-cloud","system_fingerprint":"fp_ollama","choices":[{"index":0,"message":{"role":"assistant","content":"Четвёртое упоминание профессора Звёздочкина находится в абзаце с семантическим указателем **26:1.1.1.p23**.","reasoning":"We have first batch of 3 items. First paragraph: text includes "профессор Звёздочкин" twice? Let's examine: "... астрономических наук профессор Звёздочкин, ... профессор Звёздочкин был..." That's two mentions in same paragraph. So occurrences: 1st mention, 2nd mention.

Second paragraph: includes "профессор Звёздочкин" (once, maybe also later "профессор Звёздочкин" again as "сам профессор Звёздочкин". It says "сам профессор Звёздочкин". That's one mention. So total now 3.

Third paragraph: "профессор Звёздочкин" appears once at start. That's fourth mention. So fourth mention is in paragraph with SemanticPointer "26:1.1.1.p23". Need answer location: give pointer. Also possibly verify there aren't other mentions earlier within same paragraphs that could change count but we counted correctly. The first paragraph had two mentions. Good.

Thus answer: pointer 26:1.1.1.p23.

Provide answer in Russian."},"finish_reason":"stop"}],"usage":{"prompt_tokens":1462,"completion_tokens":320,"total_tokens":1782}}
